sentences.en: But he would disgorge the bait now.
sentences.cn: 现在他要把嘴里的钩吐出来.

sentences.en: Cars drew up to disgorge a wedding party.
sentences.cn: 一辆辆轿车开过来，下来的都是参加婚宴的人。
老鼠 和 马不能呕吐.

sentences.en: She was trying hard to disgorge a fish bone.
sentences.cn: 她拚命想把鱼刺吐出来.

sentences.en: The ground had opened to disgorge a boiling stream of molten lava.
sentences.cn: 大地开裂，汩汩冒出炽热的熔岩。

sentences.en: The riches he swallowed he shall disgorge ; God shall compel his belly to disown them.
sentences.cn: 他并吞的财富,必要吐出, 天主必使之由他腹中呕出.

sentences.en: The soldiers had to disgorge the jewels which they had plundered.
sentences.cn: 士兵被迫交出抢劫的珠宝.

sentences.en: They persuaded him to disgorge the missing documents.
sentences.cn: 他们劝他吐出不见的文件.

sentences.en: They pursue other birds, forcing them to disgorge the fish they have caught.
sentences.cn: 它们追赶别的鸟儿，强迫它们吐出抓到的鱼。

sentences.en: You owe me 5: come on, disgorge!
sentences.cn: 你欠我5英镑,快, 吐出来!

trans.tran_en: if a vehicle or building disgorges people, they come out of it in a large group

trans.tran_cn: 吐出，呕吐，退出，倒出（食物、液体等）
